Projects

I've been programming seriously since about 2019, mainly working on small projects for fun and to learn. Check out some of them in more detail:

Gravity Sim
CG Rustplot
Personal Website

In rust, I've written mathematical function optimization algorithms, a SAT-solver based solution finder for code-20 cellular automata, and a widely-used ascii-art plotting library. In python, I've written many-body gravitational simulations, chess engines, a custom RREF algorithm, and more. In the Wolfram Language, I've written a quantum computing simulation and done mathematical research on functional iteration and roots.

I've also previously used languages such as Julia, p5js, and C++ for some small projects, but I'm not very familiar with them now.
